QuestData.Title: Refti Retribution
QuestData.Description:
I cannot get it out of my head, $p. So many of my sisters massacred! Lives tossed away... Their sacrifices will not go unanswered!
My soldiers have tracked down the Primalists, and they say some of our sisters are still alive.
We must rescue them, and ensure every Primalist knows my anger!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Primalists and rescue Refti in Tyrhold Reservoir.
QuestData.RewardText: I will always feel pain for those we lost, but I am thankful for the ones we rescued.
